criticalFailure.@en: The fire causes you to fall to Sleep for three hours, unable to be awakened.

criticalSuccess.@en: You create three pieces of lump charcoal instead.

effect.@en: After successfully casting, you spend three hours over a bonfire until one lump of charcoal is produced. If the charcoal is thrown into any new fire, you conjure forth an illusion of anything you can imagine, guaranteeing it’s smaller than an oxen. It has no physical tangibility, nor emits a smell, sound or taste. Anyone who sees the illusion can attempt to see through it with a successful Secret Test using Awareness. Once the duration is over, the charcoal is destroyed. This Spell requires Concentration.

reagents.@en: Set a bonfire, and you create one piece of charcoal from it (expended)
